greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest partition number divisible by n.
link: Paul Tek, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Paul Tek, PARI program for this sequence
program: (PARI) a(n) = {my(k=1,pk); while((pk=numbpart(k)) % n, k++); pk;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 26 2013
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Jul 28 2002
